attributes.description: This dashboard provides visibility into the performance, health, and throughput of Kafka consumers.

params.markdown:
### Consumer

This dashboard provides visibility into the performance, health, and throughput of Kafka consumers.

- Tracks the maximum consumer lag to identify processing delays and potential bottlenecks.
- Monitors key consumption metrics, including the rate of bytes and records consumed per second.
- Provides insight into overall consumer throughput and workload traffic.

embeddableConfig.description: The total size of records memory consumed.
The minimum rate at which the consumer sends requests to a broker
Records consumed per second by consumers
The volume of incoming data being processed by consumers.

attributes.title: [Metrics Kafka] Consumer
